sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Gilead Sciences ( GILD ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 2.6%.
Year to date, Gilead Sciences registers a 42.0% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Constellation Brands ( STZ ), trading down 1.5%.
Constellation Brands is showing a gain of 22.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 1.2%, and Morgan Stanley ( MS ), trading up 2.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
